lead_paragraph: Doctors in Belgium have rejected a request by an imprisoned murderer and rapist for medically assisted suicide, officials said Tuesday.
snippet: Doctors in Belgium have rejected a request by an imprisoned murderer and rapist for medically assisted suicide, officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: Belgium: Convict’s Request for Assisted Suicide Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Belgium: Convict’s Request For Assisted Suicide Is Rejected
